title: Superior electrochemical performance of alkali metal anodes enabled by milder Lewis acidity
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE00900B, Paper
Linlin Wang, Jiacheng Zhu, Nan Li, Zhe Zhang, Shiwan Zhang, Yifan Chen, Jianwen Zhang, Yusi Yang, Lulu Tan, Xiaogang Niu, Xuefeng Wang, Xiao Ji, Yujie Zhu
Weak Lewis acidity of potassium-ions promotes enhanced anion incorporation into the solvation shell, facilitating the formation of a more stable and dissolution-resistant solid electrolyte interphase for K metal compared with that for Li and Na metals.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
